description: This file defines data models and conversion methods for color palette items, specifically HSL and RGB representations, including utility functions for color conversions and string representations within an Android Kotlin project.

classes.name: HslColor
classes.description: A data class representing a color in HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) model with methods for conversion to RGB and hex color string, as well as distance calculation in HSL space.

classes.name: Rgb
classes.description: A simple data class for holding RGB color component values.

methods.name: toHex
methods.description: Returns the hexadecimal color string (#RRGGBB) representation of the HSL color.

methods.name: toColorInt
methods.description: Converts the HSL color to an Android packed ARGB integer.

methods.name: toHslString
methods.description: Produces a human-readable string representation of the HSL color.

methods.name: toRgb
methods.description: Converts HSL color to RGB color model.

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Calculates a simple distance metric between this HSL color and another, considering hue in a circular manner.
